QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_ext_lookup_map.id odf_pk, int_ext_lookup_map.code as code, int_ext_lookup_map.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, int_ext_lookup_map.clarity_data_type as clarity_data_type, int_ext_lookup_map.clarity_lookup_type as clarity_lookup_type, int_ext_lookup_map.im_id as im_id, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, int_ext_lookup_map.external_data_type as external_data_type, int_ext_lookup_map.external_object as external_object, int_ext_lookup_map.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, int_ext_lookup_map.clarity_object as clarity_object, int_ext_lookup_map.external_field as external_field, INT_EXT_LOOKUP_MAP.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_int_ext_lookup_map.partition_code as partition_code, INT_EXT_LOOKUP_MAP.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, int_ext_lookup_map.clarity_field as clarity_field from int_ext_lookup_map int_ext_lookup_map, int_integrationmappings int_integrationmappings, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_int_ext_lookup_map odf_ca_int_ext_lookup_map where 1 = 1 and int_ext_lookup_map.im_id = int_integrationmappings.id and int_ext_lookup_map.created_by = CREATED.user_id and int_ext_lookup_map.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and int_ext_lookup_map.id = odf_ca_int_ext_lookup_map.id
